MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G33 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in West Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.29pm. Our engineers have on site at the Whitestepps substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.10pm on Friday 20th November 2020.
